scripts.start-project: parcel public/home-page.html  public/about-page.html public/city-page.html public/shop-page.html public/products/hoody-info.hmtl public/products/jacket-info.hmtl public/products/longsleeve-info.hmtl public/products/pullover-info.hmtl public/products/sweatpants-info.hmtl public/products/t-shirt-info.hmtl public/shopping-cart-page.html public/trips-page.html -p 3000 --open
